member.name: T:BookPubDB.Repositories.UserRepository
member.summary: The UserRepository class contains methods to handle user-related operations such as login and token generation.
member.remarks: This class provides functionality for determining a user's login, whether by email or username, and generating a JWT token for authenticated users.

member.name: M:BookPubDB.Repositories.UserRepository.DetermineLogin(BookPubDB.Model.Identity.LoginUser,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.UserManager{Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.IdentityUser})
member.summary: Determines the user's login by checking either their email or username.
member.param: The login model containing the user's email or username.
The user manager used to find the user by email or username.
member.returns: A task representing the asynchronous operation, containing the found user or null if not found.

member.name: M:BookPubDB.Repositories.UserRepository.GenerateJwtToken(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.IdentityUser,Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Generates a JWT token for the specified user.
member.param: The authenticated user for whom the JWT token will be generated.
The configuration settings, used to retrieve JWT settings such as the secret key and expiration time.
member.returns: A string containing the generated JWT token.
